cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.GT 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning algorithms for managing risk in decision problems, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also mentions finance and process control, which are fields that often use optimization techniques and game theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems), and cs.GT (Game Theory).
